snippet: Police and Fire Department emergency responders took two different approaches as three men dangled in the air from safety harnesses.
abstract: New York City Police and Fire Department emergency responders take different approaches in effort to rescue workers after construction scaffold collapses on Manhattan's Upper East Side; Police Dept responders set up roof-based rescue while firefighters worked to retrieve the workers through a window, exposing friction that often arises between the two departments during emergency response operations.
lead_paragraph: Police and Fire Department emergency responders took two different approaches as three men dangled in the air from safety harnesses.

headline.seo: Skyscraper Rescue Shows Clash of N.Y. Police and Fire Depts.
headline.main: 17 Floors Up, Rescue of 3 Shows Clash of Agencies
headline.print_headline: 17 Floors Up, Rescue of 3 Shows Clash of Agencies
